name: wahoo-systm-mcp
description: MCP server for Wahoo SYSTM training data and workout management

tools.name: get_calendar
tools.description: Retrieve planned workouts in a date range

tools.name: schedule_workout
tools.description: Add a workout to the calendar on a specific date

tools.name: reschedule_workout
tools.description: Move a scheduled workout to a new date

tools.name: remove_workout
tools.description: Remove a scheduled workout from the calendar

tools.name: get_workouts
tools.description: Browse the workout library with filters and sorting

tools.name: get_cycling_workouts
tools.description: Search cycling workouts with 4DP focus filters

tools.name: get_workout_details
tools.description: Get full workout details and interval targets

tools.name: get_rider_profile
tools.description: Retrieve current 4DP values and rider profile data

tools.name: get_fitness_test_history
tools.description: List completed fitness tests and results

tools.name: get_fitness_test_details
tools.description: Get detailed data for a specific fitness test
